Name: Heartbreak Hotel
About the game: Heartbreak Hotel is a sexual adventure that encourages lewd lust. In a small town you have to build your own studio for the production of erotic films, which in the future can grow into a big sex empire. You'll have to work hard, finding a location for filming, an actress, equipment, all this is necessary to reward the audience with great films. It will not be so easy to find girls for filming, you will have to show all your charisma in order to get beauties who will participate in the filming. And in the city, in addition to all this, there is something to do: take risks in the lottery, catch your luck in a robbery, blackmail and patronize charming dancers. And your boundless charm will allow you to meet girls not only for filming, but also for personal pleasure. Achieving financial success, you will get better and better, developing the studio, buying new equipment, attracting higher-level actresses to shoot. Thus, you will ensure yourself worldwide fame on a par with the giants of erotic films and provide your companion with a place in the sun.
